posts.post_title: T205 Lang For Sale - COLOR SHIFT - SOLD
posts.post_content:
[STRIKE]This will be my only price drop before Mr. Lang heads off to eBay.[/STRIKE] - SOLD

I thought that I had found a new "Red Sock" & "White Sock" variation with this Frank Lang card until I saw it up close and realized that Frank has a severe RED COLOR SHIFT (or Rosacea?!?!?!)

Anyway, he doesn't fit my collection, but he might fit yours.

He has NO creases!

[STRIKE]$50 $38 or Best Offer[/strike] - SOLD, delivered, PayPal FF (or PayPal + 3%) if he pleases you.  

Thanks for looking, as always!
